solution_line_template: Orlando has {orlando_more_than_jenny} more cards than Jenny, so Orlando has {jenny_cards} + {orlando_more_than_jenny} = {orlando_cards} cards

Richard has {richard_multiplier} times the number of cards Orlando has. so Richard has {orlando_cards} * {richard_multiplier} = <<{orlando_cards}*{richard_multiplier}={richard_cards}>>{richard_cards} cards
